column4: hi does anyone have any idea how to get pinnacle USB PCTV Analogue working in ubuntu 9.04...? any guides tips? where to start digging? please help... me out...
run:   lsusb   websearch for the 8 character hex ID
Bus 001 Device 013: ID 2304:0232 Pinnacle Systems, Inc. [hex] PCTV 170e
